case_details.case_name: Griffin v. Sun Chemical Corporation et al

document.long_desc: First MOTION for Leave to Appear Pro Hac Vice of Keisha-Ann G. Gray (Filing fee $ 200) by Defendant Sun Chemical Corporation. (Ryan, Robin) (Entered: 03/11/2011)
ORDER granting 10 Motion for Leave for attorney Gray to Appear Pro Hac Vice as co-counsel for defendants. Signed by Judge Sandra S Beckwith on 3/14/11. (mb) (Entered: 03/14/2011)
Defendants' ANSWER to 1 Complaint filed by Sun Chemical Corporation. (Ryan, Robin) (Entered: 04/04/2011)
NOTICE of Deadline: Rule 26 Meeting Report due by 5/25/2011. (jl1) (Entered: 04/05/2011)

Corporate Disclosure Statement by Defendants Sun Chemical Corporation, DIC Corporation, Sun Chemical Group Cooperatief U.A. identifying Corporate Parent DIC Corporation, Other Affiliate Sun Chemical Group Cooperatief U.A. for Sun Chemical Corporation.. (Ryan, Robin) (Entered: 04/06/2011)

RULE 26(f) REPORT by Defendants Scott Chase, Joe Cionni, Kimberly Clark, John Rozier, Marty Salyers, Sun Chemical Corporation, Gayle Wirthwine, Tony Zwirgzdas, Plaintiff Gearron Griffin. (Ryan, Robin) (Entered: 04/26/2011)

Joint MOTION for Protective Order by Defendants Scott Chase, Joe Cionni, Kimberly Clark, John Rozier, Marty Salyers, Sun Chemical Corporation, Gayle Wirthwine, Tony Zwirgzdas, Plaintiff Gearron Griffin. (Attachments: # 1 Exhibit A) (Ryan, Robin) (Entered: 05/03/2011)

NOTICE: Telephone Conference set for 6/1/2011 10:30 AM before Magistrate Judge Stephanie K. Bowman. Counsel must login to ecf to receive instructions on this notice for the call (jl1) (Entered: 05/04/2011)
STIPULATED PROTECTIVE ORDER. Signed by Magistrate Judge Stephanie K. Bowman on 5/4/11. (jl1) (Entered: 05/04/2011)

ORDER granting 31 Motion to Vacate deadline for defendant expert disclosures. Plaintiff to serve responses to outstanding discovery and provide authorization forms by 5/4/12. Phone conference set for 5/17/12 @ 10:00 for scheduling. Signed by Magistrate Judge Stephanie K. Bowman on 4/30/12. (jl1)

REPORT AND RECOMMENDATIONS re 1 Complaint filed by Gearron Griffin: that this case be DISMISSED with prejudice. Objections to R&R due by 6/4/2012. Signed by Magistrate Judge Stephanie K. Bowman on 5/17/12. (Attachments: # 1 Certified Mail Receipt) (jl1)
